name: Nova Icons — Tokens. Networks. DApps
description:
Not every project on the Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem has a vector logo. So, we decided to support the community and made a big set.


You can use it for free in your projects.

Click ❤️ if you like the collection.


Join the Nova community ✨

Website ✦ Telegram ✦ Twitter ✦ Github


Actual project logos (December 2021)

Polkadot, Kusama, Karura, Acala, Moonriver, Moonbeam, KILT, Calamari, Manta, Shiden, Astar, Altair, Centrifuge, Khala, Phala, Bifrost, Kulupu, Basilisk, HydraDX, Parallel (Heiko), Kintsugi, Interlay, Picasso, Composable, Bit.Country, Integritee, Robonomics, Quartz, Unique, Genshiro, Equilibrium, Sherpax, ChainX, Litentry, Litmus, Crust, Sakura, Clover, PolkaSmith, PolkaFoundry, Statemine (Statemint), Edgeware, Kabocha, Subsocial, SubGame, Unorthodox, Standard, Loom, Kpron (Apron), Encointer, Mars, Ares, Crab, Darwinia, Efinity, SubDAO, Pontem, SORA, Westend, Rococo, Zeitgeist, Nodle, Coinversation, Kylin, Pichiu, Singular, CryptoLab, Polkadot.js, Sub.ID, Talisman, OriginTrail, Kanaria, RMRK, KodaDot, Dotmarketcap, Polkassembly, Polkadex, Zenlink
